layout_strategies.dashboard: Control Room Grid: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-6. Sidebar: col-span-2. Main: col-span-10.
layout_strategies.marketing: Tetris Grid: Asymmetrical layouts with large hero sections and overlapping elements.

visual_enhancers.gradients: No gradients. Use solid colors and textures.

login_bg.alt: Abstract geometric shapes in beige and brown

dashboard_empty.usage: Empty state or welcome widget background

general: Implement the 'Organic & Earthy' theme strictly. Do not revert to default blue/gray SaaS colors.
Use 'Playfair Display' for all H1-H3 headings to maintain the editorial feel.
Use 'Manrope' for all body text and UI elements.
Ensure high contrast for data visualization. Use the defined chart_colors.
Use Recharts for all charts. Customize the Tooltip and CartesianGrid to match the theme (no harsh lines).
For the 'Similarity Analysis', use a clean list or card layout with a 'Match Score' badge in the primary accent color.
All interactive elements must have `data-testid` attributes.

pages.login: Split screen. Left: Image (login_bg). Right: Clean form with 'Playfair Display' welcome message.
pages.dashboard: Sidebar navigation (collapsible on mobile). Top bar with date range picker. Main content area with 'Bento' grid widgets.
pages.analysis: Large main chart area. Below: 'Similar Stocks' horizontal scroll or grid. Right panel: Key stats (Dip/Peak points).
pages.profile: Simple card layout for user details and saved preferences.

components_to_customize: Button: Apply rounded-full and warm colors.
Card: Remove default heavy shadows, use subtle border.
Input: Warm border colors, focus ring in Terracotta.

universal_guidelines: Do not use default blue (#3b82f6) for primary actions.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the warm backgrounds.
Keep animations subtle (fade-in, slide-up) - no bouncing or excessive motion.
